Reviews.Title: Amazing smartphone
Reviews.Author: Regev
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this smartphone from Amazon and really its a very easy smartphone to recommend. The battery was very surprising - it easily survives for two days on a charge with the STAMINA Mode enabled. The phone survived many drops and swims so far and doesn't show a sign of wear and tear. It's very fast and the display is beeeeaaauuuuutttiiiiffullll.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: luis urdaneta
Reviews.Content: is definitely one of the best smart phones that currently exists, the camera is great and the screen is also gorgeous

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PHONE
Reviews.Author: NARESH SINGH
Reviews.Content: I AM AN APPLE PERSON, WHO NEVER BOUGHT AN IPHONE, DUE TO ALL THE HYPE AND DUE TO THE FACT THAT YOU ARE SUBJECT TO  'ONLY' APPLE SOFTWARE. I WAS LOOKING FOR A PHONE FOR CHRISTMAS AND THE TOSS UP WAS IPHONE 5 OR SAMSUNG GALAXY S4, FORTUNATELY I PASSED BY A SONY STORE AND SAW THIS PHONE, WE BOUGHT  C5503, C2104, C5306. BOY!! WERE WE FLABBAGASTED WITH THESE PHONES, SUPER FAST GREAT FOR PICS AND CAN ADD CAMERA LENS ON THE C5503..
